title: The New Lissandra Passive by Meddler
body:
https://imgur.com/a/95BxGAQ


> New Lissandra passive in action. Should be hitting the PBE this week!
> 
> TLDR: Enemy champions killed near Lissandra become exploding ice zombies
> 
> - Meddler

replies.body:
For clarification: The basic attack is most likely just a visual representation of the Frozen Thrall exploding.
https://imgur.com/a/h4NPCut#dlmUGTi
That is absolutely terrifying.  Imagine being a carry escaping a teamfight, with your frontline and support chasing after you!
Damn Liss has been watching GoT lately.

> [{quoted}](name=Camille Ferrøs,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=tMAVs0QJ,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-11-05T20:41:32.199+0000)
>
> Damn Liss has been watching GoT lately.

Its amazing :P Ice zombies for the ice queen great :D

> [{quoted}](name=The Iceborn,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=tMAVs0QJ,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2018-11-05T20:45:01.803+0000)
>
> Its amazing :P Ice zombies for the ice queen great :D

CORPSE FOR THE ICE QUEEN !

As someone who loves to play Lissandra.....

YES.
FRICKEN.
PLEASE!
Yep lets see if Lisandra kill Mordekaizer how many bugs will pop up. Also what if trydamere or jhin or draven get zombies that can attack you once ? Simple you get one shot nice.
Or what if Lissandra kills a target that is under the effect or Mordekaiser R? Will there be 2 zombies/ghosts?
What if she kills a Sion who has been ulted by Mordekaiser?

Let's go further, Lissandra Ulting a Sion whilst being ulted by morde, and the Zombie kills a Karthus, which produces another Zombie (I think)

How far can we go with this?
Then Karthus ult kills a Kog'maw

> [{quoted}](name=Alzon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=tMAVs0QJ,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2018-11-06T00:33:33.771+0000)
>
> What if she kills a Sion who has been ulted by Mordekaiser?

The Morde ghost will be untargetable and cannot despawn, it will permanently have the slowing field and will deal the AoE damage every 4 seconds.
https://giphy.com/gifs/oadZJB3hwMFjy

I think that only champions qualify to become Ice Thralls, not clones or revived champions.
If there are champions with revive passives, they will likely become Ice Thralls when their zombie passive ends (much like how Dark Harvest soul drops work).
The thrall doesn't actually attack, it just follows and slows you and then it explodes.

Finally FINALLY!! Praise the lord for the passive is hopefully about to ship and its so beautiful!
The queen can now raise ice zombies:D is ther anything more beautiful {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

Imagine how sick this will look on her skins...

Program Lissandra in particular.
This is really cool and beautiful, but I've been expecting more things visually.
The zombies can basic attack? that's concerning

> [{quoted}](name=Moody P,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=tMAVs0QJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-05T19:51:42.874+0000)
>
> The zombies can basic attack? that's concerning

It hits once in the same moment that it explodes
huge cho/zac better stay huge if she kills them
Oh no, it is the smell of bugs.

This is interesting but seems very hit or miss, she'll either devastate a team with it or it'll end up being useless. Especially if you kill a champion with low ms that can't catch up to other champions but I guess that's what all her cc is for. 

I'd like it if statues were built into her kit outside of her passive. Like her E or other abilities leave behind a (weaker?) ice statue when they hit their target, they all cast another Q when liss does etc.
Imagine if Ice Thralls got MS when walking in her Frozen Tomb AoE (when she ults herself) and then they just speed to their closest targets to explode. That would be cool.
I like this idea but is there really nothing her passive does for laning? I mean this thing's useless unless someone actually dies.

> [{quoted}](name=TheCancerousCrab,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=tMAVs0QJ,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2018-11-06T01:53:01.904+0000)
>
> I like this idea but is there really nothing her passive does for laning? I mean this thing's useless unless someone actually dies.

They're pretty much altering the first one where she made ice statues on kills/assists.

Her free spell passive is better in pretty much every scenario compared to the two.

To further add, I made a post a while back saying that in order to make the passive more viable she should be able to interact with her passive through her other abilities.

Ex:
Q- When cast on a statue it will destroy the statue and extend the range of this ability while increasing its damage.
W- Instantly destroy all statues within the radius of this spell's effect range.
E- Casting this ability will cause all statues to converge towards the targeted direction in which this spell was cast.

Another one that just came to mind that I didn't think of before is that the passive could be like Yorick's where every few deaths spawns a statue, and canon minions/large monsters/champion kills/assists always spawn a statue.

It would make her like a pseudo-Azir/Yorick hybrid.

> Her free spell passive is better in pretty much every scenario compared to the two.

This is a pretty boring passive and all it added was to make Lissandras Manacosts exceptional high as payback. They actualy can adn will increase some of their manacosts for removing that free spell.

Her new passive will actualy do more as her old ever did. Like other champions ahd reall passives and she got -  a free spell? Like as any midlaner with a bluebuff or lategame with a manaitem and a manarune runs out of mana.

And what is wrong about passives don't doing much for the laning phase? Like old Katarinas passive was also just a passive giving cd back after someone dies. New one added the spindmg on getting a dagger and reducing e cd, but that basicly moved from her old w as her new w also is no dmg at it's own anymore.

Shyvanna also got turned to mostly jungling as her passive only favors fighting dragons and getting resistances on killed dragons, no reall laningphase rune. 

jinx, also a killpassive. Yes it activates on towers and inhibs but you know how they lenghten the laningphase preseason by adding plates to the tower and giving it 5k health?


Lissandra is allready a REALLY strong champion in the current meta without having a real passive. She is a cc champion. SHe does not need thousands of interactions with every ability and her new passive. That would overcomplicate the champion and would turn her to balance nightmare similare to Ryze, Zoe and (old) Azir.

The thing that people don't seem to understand about the previous suggested passive is that it's a real do nothing passive. It's a passive that 9/10 doesn't do anything good.

Get a wombo? You've already won and your passive does nothing.

Pick someone off? Enemy team just backs off.

Engaging a fight to pop off your passive? Nothing changing about her old play style of run in burst zhonya/ult to save self and fly out.

Use it to turn a fight? Not really. If you turn a fight you've already won and it will only benefit said fight if said person(s) died in an advantageous position.

The current suggested passive is also doing the same thing. It's going to be very bad 9/10. That's why I stand by with saying the free spell passive is better in every situation. That's also why I've stated that she should be able to do more with her passive to benefit from it and have more synergy.

Smacking such a passive onto Liss is like the old rito development of: everything needs a poking ability on Q, a shield/heal W, a dash/blink on E, and their ult has to be this big damage dealing ability.

Saying her new passive is useless is like saying Sions/Kog'maws/Karthus passive is useless as "enemy team allways can just back off".
You act like either everyone dies at the same second or no one dies or 1 dies and the others just back off. Thats not the case. Most teamfights take like 15-45s. For this you can use the lissandra passive on a few targets. Fights don't move much on the Baronpit, dragonpit or nexus so teams can't as easily back off. Also it is not like this passive was tested over months from players of diffrent mmrs how useful it would be. For this the first iteration of standing statues allready got changed and if the rioter says the new passive looks promising then it says it gets proced kinda quite often.

Meddler allready tried really many, many diffrent passives. Many just playing around mana. But as leagues manaitems and runes work you really don't need much playroom there.

 No one says the passive is the big deal. A passive should not even be the big deal, for this you have 4 actives. But the free spell passive literaly added nothing. YOU DON'T HAVE MANA PROBLEMS PAST FIRST MANA ITEM.

Err wut? I never brought in the passive of other champions outside of using Yorick's as an example. To top it off those death passives are far, far better than the statue passive.

You keep only thinking of situations in which it will work instead of how it will actually work. Karthus' passive works because you can cast abilities during its duration. To top it off it has synergy. Fast casting Q coupled with a massive AOE slow and spell. Sion gets a speed boost on top of life steal as well damage. Kog gets increased movement speed to ensure he gets his passive off on top of it being AOE true damage. Liss' statues? Oh they just sit there and explode after a few seconds. Super synergistic with her kit when the enemy can move slightly to the left to avoid the statues.

Again my point is about synergy. You seem to be missing that point. Which I've pointed out multiple times and am doing yet again.

Synergy.

SYNERGY.

S Y N E R G Y.

S
Y
N
E
R
G
Y
.

I'm sure you get the point now.

> Liss' statues? Oh they just sit there and explode after a few seconds. Super synergistic with her kit when the enemy can move slightly to the left to avoid the statues.

So the statues slow allready by beeing near enemy champions. So instead of ahvign increased ms only like kog they slow the enemy for the same end result.
cons: if enemy dashs/flashs away the slow aura reaches not while a kog'maw or sion would keep running (but sion can also get cc or killed).
pros: if they slow it does not only benefit the thralls to get their explosion dmg, it benefits lissandras whole team.

So what other synergies has lissandra or what can she do if they keep dashing/flashign away from the thralls? Wells he can use her w root, her q slow, her ult as a stun or slowing area. She can follow up with her e or with protobelt to get into range for her abilities,e speicalyl her w. 

And you still ask where the synergie is from her passive and her kit? Sry but not everything does need to be SUPER synergie with each other like ryze. Where that leads should be clear enough as we all time no matter which reworked version we have diffrences to high elo/competive and the main folk at low elo.

Okay, I'm done. You clearly don't seem to be understanding anything. Last reply. Your problem is that as long as it's not the mana passive you're fine with it. It's pretty much like saying a white paper bag is better than a brown paper bag. Your paper bags keep breaking. Then when someone hands you a bag made of better material you go, "WTF is this? This is worse! I don't want this!"

Liss' suggested passives may seem good, but it's bad. Like, super fucking bad. It's a passive that doesn't do anything. It may seem good because you get aoe slows and aoe bursts, but it's not good. As I've stated already when you get the passive off you've already won. When you win it does nothing. You have to kill people in super opportune positions to get the full effectiveness. I feel as though this is the part that you don't understand and are unwilling to understand.

You can't compare Liss' suggested passives to Kog/Sion/Karth. While yes, they are trigger effects they're all different in their own rights as I've stated. Each one works to the advantage of the champion. Liss' suggested passives just doesn't do any of that. Even if you get a root or a slow what does that do? Pretty much nothing. Even with the newer suggested one it's still doesn't help much. Unless the passive last for longer than 4 seconds. If it does then it's not as bad. If they only move through say whatever Liss' AA's then that just makes it even worse because you'll have to put yourself in a bad position to get the passive off. If they randomly run around and blowup wherever they choose then that also makes it bad.

My suggested changes are to more align Riot's suggested passive to be more ideal towards what Riot is trying to achieve. What they're trying to achieve is to push her past her current play style. Her current play style is E in, R someone, press Zhonya's, and then E out. With my suggested changes you drastically change her play style to increase skill expression while at the same time changing her play style as a whole.

> Your problem is that as long as it's not the mana passive you're fine with it.

This is not my problem. This is literaly the truth. 

> It's pretty much like saying a white paper bag is better than a brown paper bag. Your paper bags keep breaking. Then when someone hands you a bag made of better material you go, "WTF is this? This is worse! I don't want this!"

Aeh, nope. My idea, and hear me out on this is this: I and Liss players want mostly a paperbag. Before i just got a tissue. And you suggest a whole disposal site. While a: Only a paperbag is needed, b: Only a paperbag is allowed as every other champion also has limited space and not whole waste disposal sites.

~~Liss' suggested passives may seem good, but it's bad. Like, super fucking bad. It's a passive that doesn't do anything... I~~

And here is your big problem: You actualy never played this passive self. you never gave it an actual chance. This is like saying "playing absketball is easy" while never playing basketball. "it may seem much to run and hard to hit but all you ahve to do is throw the ball from far and get your 3 pointers."
Like even if played like 2 pbe games what should i trust more: the people that have playtested it for months - or that random internet guay who not even played 1 game with that passive and just looks from above?

Eh, no.
I've never had any mana problems as Lissandra.
Her passive may have aided her laning phase a bit but when you actually buy RoA, it becomes pretty pointless.

I don't think that at any point, a champion's passive should be obsolete.
And to top it all off, Lissandra usually has worse damage output than any other mage considering her kit and all and that she gets a lot more bang for her buck if she buys into scaling mage items. You pay a pretty hefty price if you want to itemize full damage because you'll never get in a situation where you can trade with a truly ranged champion.

> I've never had any mana problems as Lissandra.
Her passive may have aided her laning phase a bit but when you actually buy RoA, it becomes pretty pointless.

And that is what i said: Her live passive is useless, thanks for proving it even more. If you never got mana issues it also jsut provs how broken riots manasystem si to never really run out of mana with 1, 2 items.

Ofcourse she has lower damage, her main strenght is the big amounts of cc she can bring together with that potential zoning potential. And if she goes aftershock she can be even more tankier but also deals ofcourse less dmg on both, having elss ap from runes (changes with preseason as well) and not having comet, aery, electrocute or maybe new pbe dark harvest.

Seems really feast or Famine. Either u or ur team does well and gets to keep making the enemy team dislike fighting her, or she never gets to use it and feels a bit more useless.

Unlike Morde where u can get in an R on a low enemy that would have escaped and wait for a free kill or when u can get ur entire team to collapse on an Ulted target to turn the fight into a 6/4 with the enemy ADC on ur side the turn the fight around. 

I feel like this lacks the ability to turn the enemy's advantage into their disadvantage, since its only and additional explosion... doesn't have the same impact it doesnt have enought impact

I also fail to see how it fits with her theme like at ALL. I guess i understand they are trying to pay homage to the older passive...but it honestly doesn't make any more sense thematically than the 1st or 2nd passives, and it seems worse mechanically for the game than the 2nd passive even if its better than the 1st. I think they need to go back to the drawing board, purely based on the fact that it could be feast or famine. I don't think we need another champ like Kindred or Draven who can't use their passive unless someone dies, and these are champs that have been notoriusly hard to balance if im not mistaken. 

dont get me wrong it looks cool, but it doesn't seem like the best idea

I guess we will have to wait and see

Learn from ur mistakes Rito: Dont make champions or reworks with map traversing abilities, dont make champions with passives that require them to kill opponents, don't make champions that break too many rules at once.
If ur not absolutely sure u can't make it work, then pls be cautious.

The thing here is that Lissandra isn't losing anything. Her current passive is going away but her mana costs/regeneration/pool are being adjusted for that. She is gaining something entirely new that will actually make her something more than just her 4 abilities. It also gives her a specific niche that she can fill as a teamfight CC mage that thrives off of participation.

There are always some champs that have passives that are feast or famine, and this one isn't one that will become extremely hard to balance because of the fact that it is extremely situational. The damage doesn't have to be the focus piece of her passive, it can be the AoE slow, meaning that it won't be busted. Also, we don't know yet if they want to add a static cooldown or something that prevents it from getting out of hand in teamfights, so waiting will be our best bet.

Riot has taken a lot of time to consider this passive (too much imo), and they have taken so much from Lissandra mains to forge a new and thematically impressive passive that gives her what she needs in terms of gameplay relevancy. This will turn out okay.

> [{quoted}](name=FelixFurry,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=tMAVs0QJ,comment-id=00110000,timestamp=2018-11-06T08:41:53.413+0000)

> There are always some champs that have passives that are feast or famine, and this one isn't one that will become extremely hard to balance because of the fact that it is extremely situational. The damage doesn't have to be the focus piece of her passive, it can be the AoE slow, meaning that it won't be busted. Also, we don't know yet if they want to add a static cooldown or something that prevents it from getting out of hand in teamfights, so waiting will be our best bet.

yeah i guess as long as the dmg isn't the focus it should be alright, ur right we will have to see, but i do hope its more CC/Utility focused.
I'm glad that they listen to the lissandra mains, getting the community involved to improve the game in a healthy way is important. I've played with Liss b4 and and am familiar with her Lore so I do still fail to see how it fits her thematically even if it fits into her kit in terms of mechanics/gameplay.

What do u think about the ability to use it compared to the 2nd passive tho? She could get more use out of it or less use.

I waited to respond to this until the patch came out with the passive, and so far I think that she can get more use out of the new passive _situationaly._ The identity of her play pattern has shifted massively from being able to 1v1 to being forces to get into xv5 or xv4 fights where you can get massive procs of your passive. Especially with Dark Harvest, you can get the most use out of your passive because the DH proc will kill them if it activates, plus the reset. She can finally use the full efficiency of {{item:3027}} RoA because her passive doesn't stop the {{item:3010}} Catalyst passive anymore, so her mana issues are, for the most part, solved. I think the passive is way more useful now throughout most of the game and, while it may need to be tweaked, is massively successful in regards to usage and power shift.
Would've prefered something that could have an actual impact in 1v1 lane situations but well, it can't be worse than her present one
True, at least now her passive won't randomly make her not proc the Catalyst heal or Tear's mana-stacking. That's always good in my book.
{{champion:96}} explodes twice?

MAYBE THEY WILL RELEASE NEW LISSANDRA SKIN ALONG WITH PASSIVE UPDATE.

I have been waiting for this for so long rito pls :c <3
Lissandra is the Game of Thrones Night King confirmed
Lissandra just became a BEAST in ARAM!!! -- Proper thing for an Ice Queen :) :)
_At last , our ascension is at hand _

> [{quoted}](name=kneel on Ice,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=tMAVs0QJ,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2018-11-06T17:05:05.882+0000)
>
> _At last , our ascension is at hand _

Good one ;)
They have ran out of ideas... So if she gets a penta kill she will raise all the 5 zombies?
why not ?
